titleStmt.title: The worst enemy conquered A brief discourse on the methods and motives to pursue a victory over those habits of sin, which war against the soul. Delivered, on June 6th. 1698. the day for election of officers, in the Artilery-Company [sic], at Boston. By Mr. Joseph Belcher, Pastor of the church in Dedham. [Two lines in Latin]
titleStmt.author: Belcher, Joseph, 1669-1723.
Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.
Ancient and Honorable Artillery Company of Massachusetts.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bartholomew Green, and John Allen,

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2490 lacks leaf A2 and A7.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
